an1.14:1: "Bhikkhus, I do not see even one other thing on account of which unarisen restlessness and remorse arise and arisen restlessness and remorse increase and expand so much as an unsettled mind.[n.25]Avūpasantacittassa.Mp:"A mind not settled by jhāna or insight."For one with an unsettled mind, unarisen restlessness and remorse arise and arisen restlessness and remorse increase and expand."
